items.sentence: I wish that I was able to tell the difference.
Is it true that you're not allowed to tell me?
Tell me why you think that you can't trust me.
I think that you know which one I like better.
There's nothing that I can do to help you now.
It didn't cost us much to have our barn built.
I thought that you were still studying French.
Tom wasn't able to get the lawn mower started.
You sure do eat a lot of junk food, don't you?
I always drink a cup of coffee in the morning.
I help my mother with the housework every day.
I didn't get any Christmas presents this year.
I shudder at the thought of what might happen.
Is this the first time Tom has ever done this?
Did you turn the light in the living room off?
Tom memorized a short list of very long words.
Tom has a love-hate relationship with his job.
Tom did his best to forget about his troubles.
I'll be getting back home today at about 2:30.
We have the right to refuse service to anyone.
